articles.title: Smita Patil: In Retrospect - India Today
articles.description: Smita Patil is a legend, a gift to Indian cinema that was taken too soon. On her birth anniversary, here's remembering the icon.
articles.content: Smita Patil has starred in over 80 films across languages - Hindi, Bengali, Marathi, Gujarati, Malayalam and Kannada - in a career that spanned just over a decade.
